pr_title: HDDS-3679. Add unit tests for PipelineManagerV2.

timeline.message: HDDS-3679 Add complelete tests for PipelineManagerV2.

timeline.bodyText: There is no need to return HddsProtos.Pipeline as a response to updatePipelineState.
timeline.author: nandakumar131
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -58,7 +58,7 @@ void removePipeline(HddsProtos.PipelineID pipelineIDProto)
    * @throws IOException
    */
   @Replicate
-  void updatePipelineState(HddsProtos.PipelineID pipelineIDProto,
+  HddsProtos.Pipeline updatePipelineState(HddsProtos.PipelineID pipelineIDProto,

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/hadoop-hdds/server-scm/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdds/scm/pipeline/StateManager.java b/hadoop-hdds/server-scm/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdds/scm/pipeline/StateManager.java
index 7edf07c4e..3a772e56d 100644
--- a/hadoop-hdds/server-scm/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdds/scm/pipeline/StateManager.java
+++ b/hadoop-hdds/server-scm/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdds/scm/pipeline/StateManager.java

@@ -58,7 +58,7 @@ void removePipeline(HddsProtos.PipelineID pipelineIDProto)
    * @throws IOException
    */
   @Replicate
-  HddsProtos.Pipeline updatePipelineState(HddsProtos.PipelineID pipelineIDProto,
+  void updatePipelineState(HddsProtos.PipelineID pipelineIDProto,
                            HddsProtos.PipelineState newState)
       throws IOException;

timeline.bodyText: We don't have to construct the Pipeline from proto object. stateManager#getPipeline should be sufficient to get the updated pipeline.
timeline.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText: This is never used for verification, can be removed.
timeline.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText:
Assert.assertTrue can be replaced with Assert.assertEquals.
Assert.assertEquals will give a better context in case of test failure.
timeline.author: nandakumar131

replies.bodyText: These are copied from original TestSCMPipelineManager tests. I will update them.
replies.author: timmylicheng

timeline.bodyText: Assert.assertTrue can be replaced with Assert.assertEquals.
timeline.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText: Instead of IOException, we can check for PipelineNotFoundException.
timeline.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText: Instead of IOException, we can check for PipelineNotFoundException.
timeline.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText: Can be simplified to assertTrue and assertFalse.
